Name: AzkerM
AboutMe:
A networking professional now moved into hospitality and tourism IT structured. Technology inspires me as there's no boundary for our learning. I meddle with Linux distro(s) mostly ignoring Windows, that is because of the love I have with Open-source. Love taking challenges and love playing with almost all the tech stuffs but not limited to IT.

I founded GeekLK, a tech blog where I use to pour my knowledge in my leisure time & co-founded Aqurex Technologies, a reliable IT solutions provider.

Ask Ubuntu is where I roam the most.
